33.text: After the #ChristchurchAttack, was there self-reflection by #AustralianMedia commentators on the role of the media?  Our Media Monitoring team reviewed newspaper opinion articles and TV current affairs shows during the week after the attack and analysed 49 pieces.  Read more: https://t.co/aNkMrxfha0
